Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.ClientView
public class ClientView
extends Observable
Class ClientView is a simplified representation of the model.

      Returns the turnActive attribute.
      Returns:
      true if the player is the current player, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      market - the new market disposition
      toPrint - true if the updated disposition needs to be showed to the player, false otherwise

    • setDevDecks

      public void setDevDecks​(DevCardInfo newCard, int c, int l, boolean toPrint)
      Sets one of the development cards which are on top of the development decks.
      Parameters:
      newCard - the new development card
      c - the int that represents the colour of the card
      l - the level of the card
      toPrint - true if the updated decks need to be showed to the player, false otherwise
